Title: Relates to the exercise of powers and duties of the board of elections of the city of New York and its executive management
Summary: Relates to the exercise of powers and duties of the board of elections of the city of New York and its executive management; provides for equal representation among certain employees of the board of elections; relates to qualification and removal of certain employees of the board of elections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the exercise of powers and duties of the board of elections of the city of New York and its executive management
